reviewText: Got this DVD because it had 4 shows I didn't have and the price was definitely right.  Picture quality is excellent too.  Recommended for anyone following the series.
Bam, it's all here. Enjoy the movie franchise and having the entire collection in one tiny box.
this is a good buy for those who don't want to buy individual moves in the series, they have combos with 2 up to 5 in the series, anymore is only blu ray, but think you can buy them on dvd too
Great movies at a great price for all of them
I've enjoyed watching and re-watching these movies for a long time so I was glad I found the collection on DVD.  These are pretty much the only zombie movies I'll watch.

Overall the Resident Evil series is a strong horror/action series with a lot of style and of course Milla Jovovich is fun throughout. It ain't great, but it is a good popcorn series. My only advice though is skip this set (unless it's much cheaper and you don't care about getting the whole series) since it leaves out the final two films. There's a 5 film set out now for $15~$20, and no doubt there will be a 6 film set in a year or two. Resident Evil / Resdent Evil: Afterlife / Resident Evil: Apocalypse / Resident Evil: Extinction / Resident Evil: Retribution - Set
Awesome movies! I love that all 4 is packaged in 1 case! Great game and great zombie movie! You don't need to have any real knowledge of the game in order to understand and follow the movie.
Don't need to say anything it in the title.

Excellent set of movies.  Of course, I love Milla Jovovich. Note: I bought this collection quite some time ago.  Don't know why the review came up now. In any case, you will enjoy hours of entertainment watching Milla kill the walking dead.
all in one is great thank you
In love with the movies but not with the delivery . I only received one disc and it only has 2 movies on it. Where's the other two movies or disc? ?
This was a gift and they loved it. Great service too.
I watched all these in one night and became a big fan :) love them!
Exactly as described.  Great to have the first four movies.
Good Series. Not a dull moment.
Any fan of this movie this is a must have. Great for watching over and over.
Pretty good movie collection not bad for the price
One more to go to complete series
I bought it because it  was a great price.
I loved the movie because it was just so amazing
I am highly satisfied with my purchase, i am a big fan of all the movies!
Package was left at different, a person returned my package and I love the movies.
Never saw this series so thought why not start with this awesome 4-pack......worth it.....an awesome movie collection, can't wait to the finale on the big screen :)
Perfectly , great price. showed up on time. Will buy from this company again
Was able to feed my Resident Evil fix in one shot.

I don't know what's more impressive the fact that these movies go out of the way to make all the characters obsolete compare to Alice with bad story telling and bad effects or the fact that people actually like these movies. While the first movie wasn't that bad and didn't completely ruin the resident evil characters, the second one takes a turn for the worst and completely ruins the chance or hope that the series ever had. That being said it is one of the better video game movie franchises, but that's not saying much really.
These are some of my favorites. I even play the resident evil video games along with my children.

Not sure why I loved this series so much.  I tell myself it's because I played the video games, but I didn't like the Tomb Raider movies nearly as much.  I find Resident Evil to be a timeless zombie action classic.  I'm really glad first four come as a set.  Very much looking forward to last movie in series coming out.
I've been looking for the collection for a long time...
Bought this for my husband for Fathers Day. He loves all of these movies!!

I'm playing the first disc on my PS3 and I can't seem to get the subtitles to come up. Can anyone help me with this? Every time I hit the "subtitle" button on my PS3 remote it says "There are no subtitle options available". I love these movies but the subtitles are important to me, so unfortunately I'm going to have to give a one star unless I can figure out how to fix this.
Fun action packed movies. I like that you get all 4 in 1.
This collection doesn't have any of the bells & whistles but at this price you can't beat it.

My first step towards owing all of the movies.  Was tired of just trying to find them on TV to watch so I just pulled the trigger.  Great bang for your buck!  These movies are what they are and I enjoyed them very much.  Look forward to every movie being more ridiculous than the next.
Worked great! Movies just as expected :)
This particular item is missing a disc I would like a refund
I love resident evil, and I did even before the movie. The price I paid for this movie collection was darn good. An I got them new undamaged.

Has all 4 films from this awesome franchise. There are no bonus or scene selection options. It is literally: "Resident Evil" and "Resident Evil Apocalypse" on the menu for disc one and "Resident Evil Extinction" and "Resident Evil Afterlife" for disc two. It doesn't bother me due to the fact I just wanted the movies and that was what I got for an awesome price.
item came as described and in a timely manner,

Resident Evil set the stage for shows like the Walking Dead which is so popular right now, though Resident Evil has more of a superhero type movie to it as the Mila Jovovich has superhuman relexes due to her being a lab experiment anomaly.  What more can you say than zombies, guns, karate, and trying to survive?

Well, what can you ask for if you love Milla and her franchise "Resident Evil"? A DVD that has the first 4 movies! If you only have a DVD player and love these movies, get this set! It is a 2 DVD set, movies only, with part 1 and 2 on first DVD, part 3 and 4 on second DVD. For price, you can't go wrong on this edition!  I was pleasantly surprised that I received an UltraViolet piece in the package.

Disc 1 ~ RESIDENT EVIL,  RESIDENT EVIL: APOCALYPSE
Disc 2 ~ RESIDENT EVIL: EXTINCTION, RESIDENT EVIL: AFTERLIFE

These are standard DVD editions with no special features, movies only. Good for the price and the no frills moviegoer that only wants the movies!

I just bought this at my local Walmart for 9.96... definitely had to stalk the movie section for three weeks, but it was worth it. But if your looking online this has to be the cheapest price I've seen so far. Great movies, I love that it's all four. Now all I need Is Retribution.

This will be great christmass gift for my son. Love that it's all 4!
Fast shipping

My go to movie!  Milla plays an awesomely intelligent/strong woman. The characters are tough and strong. My kids got me addicted to the movies, by letting me watch them play the game.  Great monsters, characters and the story goes forward fluidly.  Plug it in and have a ride!!!
It's nice to have all the movies on one disc.
Poor quality and 4 movies on 2 disc. They made me pay shipping so my refund was about $2
What's not to love Resident Evil x 4!
Great 4 movies no problems with movies
